original_text: You will have another festival that starts on the 15th day of the 7th month. It will continue for seven days. Each day, the ruler must provide the same things for sin offerings, burnt offerings and grain offerings, as well as the olive oil.’
korean_text: 일곱째 달 열다섯째 날에 칠 일 동안 명절을 지켜 속죄제와 번제며 그 밀가루와 기름을 드릴지니라

sentences.original_text: that starts on the 15th day of the 7th month
It will continue for seven days
Each day, the ruler must provide the same things
sentences.korean_translation: 매일, 통치자는 동일한 것들을 제공해야 한다

sentences.original_text: for sin offerings, burnt offerings and grain offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 죄를 위한 제물, 번제물과 곡물 제물을 위해

sentences.original_text: as well as the olive oil
